features: This majestic haaram features a captivating central pendant showcasing a large, square-cut natural Emerald. The pendant is embellished with two gracefully designed peacock motifs (Mayura), crafted from Polki diamonds. The neckpiece is a delicate but ornate chain of polkis set in gold, creating a seamless transition to the showstopping pendant. The overall design speaks of a traditional South Indian aesthetic, elevated with modern elegance.

description: This haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian design with a touch of modern sophistication. The use of uncut Polki diamonds lends a unique, antique charm, while the large, high-quality emerald ensures it will be a cherished heirloom for generations. Its traditional symbolism and regal design make it a valuable investment piece. The peacock is auspicious.
